word:
My brethren and sisters, appreciate and study the truths God has given for you and your children. Spend not 
                                                                           175
your time in seeking to know that which will be no spiritual help. "What shall I do to inherit eternal life?" (Luke 10:25). This is the all-important question, and it has been clearly answered. "What is written in the law? how readest thou?"--Manuscript 26, 1901.
